title: Body site

bodysite.description: ReadOnly, Nomenclature code referring a specific muscle group engaged. Refer to Annex C of IEEE Std 11073-10442-2008.

observedtime.description: ReadOnly, An ISO8601 format time indicating when the data is observed (ex: 2016-02-15T09:19Z)
